title: Dye wastewater treatment and membrane fouling in a moving bed-UV-photocatalytic modified membrane bioreactor
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00474D, Paper
Jing Luo, Tingxi Liu, Weiwei Chen, Caixia Dong, Jianguo Liu
A moving bed-UV-photocatalytic modified membrane bioreactor (MB-UVPMBR)system effectively removed organic matter, and the removal efficiency of LanasolBlue 3R (LB) reached 85.1%, which was significantly greater than that in a movingbed...
